Summary: Black orb appears with commerical airliner and turns into red/silver flying triangle
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Oak Lawn
There were no other sightings in Oak Lawn on or around July 26th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting outside on the outside patio facing west. it was a beautiful early evening, calm and clear blue skies. i was watching the commerical jets fly out low one by one heading out to the south over our house which is about 5 miles from midway airport. all the planes at this time around 8pm were flying out in the same pattern from my vantage point. then around 8:10pm the same configured commerical plane was flying over the yard when i noticed what looked like at first to be a black bird fly straight up out of nowhere up towards the back of the plane. i watched and thought that was a close call for the bird. this object that i thought was a bird flew straight up as the plane past under it. then i saw the object that i thought was a bird start getting larger and larger and it was not flying or making manuvers like a bird would. it did not have wings. as this obect got larger it looked like a dull black gray round sphere. as this object turned into this sphere it started moving east towards me and straight over the roof lines of the homes on the block. this was all happening maybe 500-700 feet up. then i ran inside the house to get my camera. when i came out the object was still heading east over the house but it now looked like a triangle or v with a bright red bottom and a silver top and was as large as a smaller commercial jet. it was moving slowly in a straight line right over me and the roof. as it came over the roof of the house i ran to the backyard so i could keep on watching it. as soon as i got to the back yard it disappeared into thin air. i ran around the whole front\ back of the yard, street and it was nowhere. the rate of speed it was going was very slow and steady like it was trolling, so i dont now how it just disappeared. the object made no noise. it was very bright and glowing. after that i was scratching my head in wonder. i was also at this time watering the lawn with the sprinkler. i went back out to the patio and sat there for a couple minutes and kept looking around. then about 10 minutes later i went to the front of the house to move the sprinkler. now iam at the end of the driveway facing south and to my right in the sky i see a large pinkish silver large sphere flying slowly over the tree about a block away. at first i thought it could be a jet with the setting sun hitting it. but it was going too slow, a commerical jet would have been long gone already. it didnt have any lights, noise, windows, markings. it looked like it was glowing and it had like a fog\hazy whirlwind cloud swirling around it. again, this object was as large as a smaller commercial jet that as it moved over the tree it got half that size. this object then just disappeared into thin air. i then went walking up and down the street\yard to try and find it because it was going so slow. i never saw it again.
